document_data.name: Halinaxus
document_data.mainbody: '''Halinaxus''' was a [[red dragon]] at the [[Fane of the Eye]] under [[Tyar-Besil]] during the [[Elemental Evil]] crisis.
document_data.Personality: Halinaxus toyed with the idea of allying with the [[Cult of the Eternal Flame]]. He sensed the power they had and hoped to one day seize it for himself. He liked the treasures that [[Vanifer]] promised to him, but could not decide if he should join them.
document_data.History: In [[1491 DR]], Halinaxus was in the Fane's Eternal Flame section until some adventurers infiltrated the fane and confronted him.
